29: Kiana, did you feel anything weird?

ねぇ、キアナちゃん、おかしいと思わない？
저기, 키아나, 이상하다고 생각 안 해?

Hey, Kiana, don't you think it's funny?
The Houkai is already happened, why there is still a train moving?

붕괴가 일어났는데, 어떻게 전철이 움직이고 있는 거지?

Why is there a train in operation on the tracks when the collapse has obviously happened?

唔~或许是没人驾驶所以失控了吧？
う～ん、壊れて誤作動をしてるとか？
음~ 고장 나서 오작동을 하고 있다든가?
Hmm, maybe no one was driving so it got out of control?
Well, maybe no one was driving so it got out of control?
I hope so, but did you find there was always a train moving while we are fighting with mecha girls…
如果是这样的话也就算了，但是琪亚娜，你有没有发现，每次我们和这些机甲兵器交手的时候，总会有一辆运作中的列车在附近驶过。
もし、そうならいいけど……でも気づいてる？機甲兵器が襲ってくる時、いつも電車が近くを走っているの。
만약 그렇다면 좋겠지만... 근데 알아챘어? 기갑병기가 습격해올 때마다 항상 전철이 근처를 지나가고 있어.
It would be fine if that were the case... but haven't you noticed? Every time we fight these mechas, there's always a train passing by.
It would be fine if that was the case, but Kiana, have you noticed that every time we engage these mecha weapons, there is always an operating train going by nearby?
I hope so, but have you noticed that on ......? There's always a train running nearby when the armored weapons attack.
Do you mean there is some relationships between the train and Mecha girls?
唔……芽衣学姐，你的意思是这些机甲娘和列车有关系么？
つまり……襲ってくる機甲と電車に何か関係があるってこと？
그 말은... 습격해오는 기갑과 전철 사이에 무슨 관계가 있다는 거야?
So you're saying... there's some connection between the mechas and the trains?
Well ...... Meiko-senpai, do you mean that these mecha girls have something to do with the train?
So you're saying that there's some connection between the ...... attacking armor and the train?
Yes, although I can't promised that, but I can feel there is soemthing wrong with that.
虽然不能肯定，但是我觉得其中一定有什么关联，比如说这些机甲兵器是在保护列车？

Although I can not be sure, but I think there must be some connection, such as these mecha weapons are protecting the train?

It's strange. The experiments in that laboratory and those mechas... What on earth has Father been up to...?
It's really too strange, that lab too, these mecha weapons too...what the hell is Father-sama doing?
It's crazy. The research in the experimental building and that armored ...... What the hell is your father ...... doing?
Ha? Phone rings… I thought it was broke, let me see…

うん？また崩壊エネルギーの検知？どれどれ……。

检测到崩坏源反应，距离1000…800…600…唔，果然是坏了，哪有崩坏源跑那么快的。
崩壊源との距離1000……800……600……何これ、すごい勢いで近づいてるんだけど。崩壊源がこんなスピードで移動するわけ無いじゃん。やっぱ、このスマホ壊れちゃったんだ。

Avalanche source reaction detected, distance 1000...800...600...well, it's really bad, which avalanche source running so fast.

Distance to collapse source1000......800......600......What's this, it's getting very close at a very fast pace. There's no way the source of the collapse is moving this fast. I knew this phone was broken.

えぇ！？今飛んでったの、何あれ！？
엣!? 방금 날아간 거, 저건 뭐야!?
Ehh?! What just flew past us?!
Ugh!!! What was that thing that just flew past!

White rebot? It's much bigger than those Mecha girls and I saw a human on that rebot.
白色的…机器人么？比起我们之前遇到的机甲兵器大了好多，而且我没看错的话那个机器人上面还有个人影。

하얀…… 기갑? 아까 본 기갑 병기보다 훨씬 커. 게다가 기갑 위에 사람이 타고 있었어?
A white... mecha? It was much bigger than the mechas from before. And is that a person on top of it?
The white...robot? It was much bigger than the mecha weapon we met before, and there was a human figure on top of that robot if I'm not mistaken.
White ...... armored? Much larger than the armored weapons I saw earlier. And there were people on top of the armor?
Wait! It's back again! We need to retreat  first! Seems it's not so friendly!
等等！不要管那么多了！那个机甲好像又飞回来了！不管怎么样还是先撤吧！怎么看都不像是来喝下午茶的样子！
わっ、こっち戻ってきた！ひとまず逃げましょう！どう見たって味方じゃないもん！

Ahh, it's coming back! Let's get out of here for now! That thing is definitely not on our side!
Wait! Don't worry about that! That mecha seems to be flying back! Anyway, let's get out of here! It doesn't look like we're here for tea!
Wow, it's coming back this way! Let's run away for now! No matter how you look at it, they're not on our side!

Scan complete — signs of Honkai confirmed. Recovery target "Subject A". Executing response plan... Commencing recovery.

So, who are you, young lady? Do you have anything to do with those mecha weapons?

I'm autometa, amoured bunny driver Bronya.
我是嵌入式泛用少女决战兵器，重装小兔适格载体布洛妮娅。

나는 도프형 소녀 결전 병기, 중장토끼19c의 적응자 브로냐입니다.
I am Bronya, the user of the General-Purpose Maiden Battle Weapon, Armored Bunny 19C.
I am embedded in the panoply of girls dueling weapons, heavy-duty bunny fit carrier Bronya.
I am Bronya, an adaptor of the dope-type girl decisive weapon, the heavily armed rabbit 19c.
You attacked us at first, I need to give you a lesson!
你这家伙，既然先出手了那我也不客气了！
こいつッ！やる気？子供だからって、手加減はしないわよ！

Why, you—! Fine then! Just because you're a kid, I won't go easy on you!
You guys, since you made the first move then I'm not polite either!
This guy! Are you going to do it? I won't go easy on you just because you're a kid!

Kiana, be careful not to hurt the girl!
Kiana! Don't let that girl hurt you!

Did that what-the-hell-is-that-rabbit armor finally stop?

It seems that the attack just worked. Take advantage of the gap to get the girl out!

Battle ends, catch rate 24.36%, must lower than expectation, plan B, retreating…

Combat power analysis complete. Odds of successful capture down 24.36% more than expected. Change of plan: Retreat.

Combat measurements have been completed. Capture rate down 24.36%. Change of plan--begin withdrawal.
可恶……那个丫头到底怎么回事嘛！莫名其妙地出现，然而打完就跑！实在是太卑鄙了！
もうっ……何なのよ、あのガキ！勝手に襲ってきたと思ったら、今度はそそくさと逃げて！逃げるな卑怯者ーーッ！
젠장... 대체 뭐야, 저 꼬맹이! 함부로 덤벼들더니, 이번엔 황급히 도망치고! 도망치지 마 비겁자야--!
Seriously... what's wrong with that brat?! Attacking us out of nowhere,  then running away! Get back here, you COWARD!
Damn it ...... what the hell is wrong with that girl! She appeared out of nowhere, and then ran away after the fight! It's really despicable!
Oh, God. ...... What the hell is wrong with that kid? He attacked me on his own, and now he's running away! Don't run away, you coward!
Kiana! All Mecha girls are leaving with her, there must be something worng!
琪亚娜！其他的机甲也随着她一起撤走了，果然这里有问题！
キアナちゃん！他の機甲も撤退していく。やっぱり、あの子と関係があるんだわ！
키아나! 다른 기갑들도 철수하고 있어. 역시, 저 아이와 관계가 있는 거야!
Kiana-chan! The other mechas are retreating. I knew they had something to do with that girl!
Kiana! The other mechs retreated with her. Surely there's something wrong here!
Kiana! The other aircraft are retreating as well. I knew it had something to do with that girl!
ちょっと、芽衣先輩！どこ行く気！？
Hey, Mei-senpai! Where are you going?!
Hey, Mei-senpai! Where are you going!
追いかけるに決まってるでしょ！
Of course they're going to chase after it!
But… They are flying while we are walking… How can we chase her? Our aim should be escape from the Houkai area~
对面是飞的我们怎么可能追的上嘛~而且我们的目的不是逃离崩坏区域么，这种节外生枝的事情还是少掺和啦~
向こうは空を飛んでるんだよ！追いつけるわけないって！それに今はこの崩壊区域から離れることを優先しないと！寄り道してるヒマなんてないんだからっ！
저쪽은 하늘을 날고 있다고! 따라잡을 수 없어! 게다가 지금은 이 붕괴 구역에서 벗어나는 게 우선이야! 돌아다닐 여유 같은 건 없다고!
They're flying in the sky! There's no way we can catch up! Besides, our priority right now is to get out of this Honkai Outbreak! We don't have time to make detours!

They're flying in the sky! There's no way we can catch up with them! Besides, our priority right now is to get away from this collapsed area! We don't have time to stop for anything!
嗯，那我们继续按照原计划撤离吧~
それじゃ、さっさとこんなところ離れましょ。
Well then, let's hurry and get out of here.
Well, let's continue to evacuate according to the original plan~
Then let's get the hell out of here.
Kiana, can you escape by yourself, you don't need to take this risk with me… Thank you for saving me.
琪亚娜，你一个人走吧，没必要和我一起冒险…感谢你救了我。
ごめんなさい、キアナちゃん……先に行ってくれる？私、あの子がどうしても気になるの。キアナちゃん、私を助けてくれたこと一生忘れないわ……ありがとう。
미안해, 키아나... 먼저 가줄래? 나, 저 아이가 너무 신경 쓰여서. 키아나, 네가 나를 도와준 건 평생 잊지 않을게... 고마워.
I'm sorry, Kiana-chan... Can you go ahead? I'm really worried about that girl. Kiana-chan, I'll never forget how you helped me... Thank you.
Kiana, you go alone, there is no need to risk with me...thank you for saving me.
I'm sorry, Kiana, ...... can you go ahead? I really care about that girl. Kiana, I will never forget how you helped me. ...... Thank you.
Errr! Ahhhhh! Well! I know, I will go with you. Anyhow I find nothing until now, maybe I can find something I need in this thing……
呃！啊啊~好啦好啦！我知道了，我跟你一起去啦。反正现在离开也是一无所获，说不定追踪这个事件也能找到我自己想要的线索……
あー、もうっ！わかったよ、一緒に行ってあげる！私の知りたい情報を持ってる可能性だって、あるかもしれないしね。
아,真是的! 알겠어, 같이 가줄게! 내가 알고 싶은 정보를 가지고 있을지도 모르잖아.
Ahh, fine! Okay, okay, I'll come with you! Besides, maybe that girl has some clues I need.
Ugh! Aaah~ Okay, okay! I know, I'll go with you. Anyway, leaving now is also nothing, maybe tracking this event can also find my own clues ......
Oh, gosh! All right, I'll go with you! There's even a chance you might have information I need to know.
Yes… Don't show me that face~ If we meet danger, we must leave immediately.
是是…不要一幅期待的表情看着我啦~如果有什么危险我们可一定要赶紧撤离，好不容易获救的性命可得好好珍惜才行！
うん……って、そんな期待した目で見ないでよ。危なくなったら、すぐに撤退するからね！せっかく生きながらえた命なんだから、大切にしないと！

Yeah... but don't look at me with such expectant eyes. If it gets dangerous, we'll retreat immediately! Your life was saved, so we need to cherish it!
Yes, yes... don't look at me with an expectant expression ~ if there is any danger we must hurry to evacuate, it's hard to be saved life can be cherished!
Yeah ......, don't look at me with such expectant eyes. If it gets dangerous, I'll pull out as soon as I can! It's a life that I've managed to keep alive, so I have to take care of it!
ええ……ありがとう、キアナちゃん。
Haha~ Relax! See, maybe we can use the railway there~

Yeah, yeah, you're welcome! ...Hmm? Ah, Senpai, look at that! That train over there might be usable. Let's take a look!
Hey, you're welcome! Look, Meiko, the train that's parked over there doesn't seem to be too badly damaged, so let's go see if it's still usable.
Yes, yes, you're welcome! ...... hmm? Oh, senpai, look at that! That train, maybe we can use it. Let's take a look!
